design_philosophy: Minimalist tranquility, promoting focus and clarity through intuitive interaction and visual balance.

logo.concept: Stylized checkmark representing completion and flow.
logo.visual_description: Two smooth, curved lines forming a gentle checkmark, using primary color #4A90E2.

main_screen_layout.task_input_area: Prominent input field with placeholder, adjacent 'Add' button.
main_screen_layout.task_list: Vertically scrolling list of task items.

task_item_component.completion_control: Circular checkbox or toggle switch (Color: #4A90E2 when active).
task_item_component.task_description: Text using Inter. Strikethrough and #757575 for completed tasks.
task_item_component.delete_action: Subtle trash icon (Color: #E57373 on hover/focus). Confirmation modal required.

design_principles.visual_balance: Generous white space, consistent padding and margins.
design_principles.accessibility: WCAG AA contrast, clear focus states, large tap targets, scalable typography.

user_flows.add_task: Input -> Type -> Add -> Animate In -> Clear Input.
user_flows.complete_task: Tap Checkbox -> Visual Change (Strikethrough, Color) -> Task Distinguished.
user_flows.delete_task: Tap Delete Icon -> Confirmation Modal -> Confirm/Cancel -> Animate Out (if confirmed).
